Gaussian White Noise Generator¶

class gym_electric_motor.physical_systems.noise_generators.NoiseGenerator[source]¶

The noise generator generates noise added to the state for the observation.

noise(*_, **__)[source]¶

Call this function to get the additive noise.

Returns:Array of noise added to each state.
Return type:ndarray(float)
reset()[source]¶

Reset of all internal states of the Noise generator to a default.

Returns:Noise for the initial observation at time 0.
set_signal_power_level(signal_powers)[source]¶

Setting of the signal power levels (Nominal values) as baseline for the noise power.

Parameters:signal_powers (list(float)) – Array of signal powers (nominal values).
set_state_names(state_names)[source]¶

Announcement of the state names by the physical system to the noise generator.

Parameters:state_names (list(str)) – List of state names of the physical system.
